languages.text: Разломанная мебель, изодранная ткань, пятна крови — в помещении дали отчаянный отпор ксеносам.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Здесь видны следы обыска. Друхари что-то искали

languages.text: Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.
languages.original_text: Разломанная мебель, изодранная ткань, пятна крови — в помещении дали отчаянный отпор ксеносам.

traits.locale_text: Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room gave a desperate rebuff to the xenos.
Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room gave a desperate rebuff to the xenos.
Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.
Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.
Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.

languages.text: 被砸碎的家具、破烂的布料、血迹……房间里的人曾孤注一掷，试图抵挡异形的进攻。
languages.original_text: Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.

traits.locale_text: 被砸碎的家具、破烂的布料、血迹……房间里的人曾孤注一掷，试图抵挡异形的进攻。

languages.text: Muebles rotos, tela rasgada, manchas de sangre... alguien resistió desesperadamente contra los xenos en esta sala.
languages.original_text: Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Muebles rotos, tela rasgada, manchas de sangre... alguien resistió desesperadamente contra los xenos en esta sala.

languages.text: 壊れた家具、ズタズタになった布切れ、そして血痕―この部屋の主は、異種族に必死で抵抗したようだ。
languages.original_text: Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.

traits.locale_text: 壊れた家具、ズタズタになった布切れ、そして血痕―この部屋の主は、異種族に必死で抵抗したようだ。

languages.text: Kaputte Möbel, zerrissener Stoff, Blutspuren – jemand in diesem Raum hat sich verzweifelt gegen die Xenos verteidigt.
languages.original_text: Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Kaputte Möbel, zerrissener Stoff, Blutflecken – jemand in diesem Raum hat sich verzweifelt gegen die Xenos verteidigt.

languages.text: Du mobilier brisé, des tissus déchirés, des taches de sang : quelqu'un a désespérément tenté de repousser les xénos dans cette pièce.
languages.original_text: Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Du mobilier brisé, des tissus déchirés, des taches de sang : quelqu'un a désespérément tenté de repousser les xénos dans cette pièce.

languages.text: Kırılmış mobilyalar, yırtılmış kumaşlar, kan izleri. Bu odadaki biri, zenolara karşı umutsuz bir savunma gerçekleştirmiş.
languages.original_text: Broken furniture, tattered fabric, bloodstains — someone in this room put up a desperate defence against the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Kırılmış mobilyalar, yırtılmış kumaşlar, kan izleri. Bu odadaki biri, zenolara karşı umutsuz bir savunma gerçekleştirmiş.
